More Details

This site contains unsponsored and sponsored content that may be compensated through third-party advertisers.
WeBull Fees List
Account opening Fee
HK$0
HK Stock Commission
HK$0 (via electronic channels) & 0.25%（Min HK$100）(via telephone)
Platform Fee
HK$10/transaction
Handling Fee for IPO Application
Through Cash：HK$50/per application & Through Margin: HK$100/per application
About WeBull HK
Registered with and regulated by the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA), Webull Financial LLC is also a member of the SIPC, providing up to HK$500,000 protection against the loss of cash and securities held by a customer at a financially-troubled SIPC-member brokerage firm.

As a financial company driven by technology, WeBull is committed to offering an all-in-one self-directed investment platform offering excellent user experience with advanced and intelligent tools and services. Its services are characterized by the following features:
0% Commission
Free Real-Time Quotes
Multi-platform Accessibility
Full Extended Hours Trading
24/7 Online Support
Webull HK Key Features
Zero Commissions
It offers zero commissions on online stock, options, and ETFs trades. When you trade options, you also enjoy zero per contract fee. Also, no minimum deposit required for brokerage accounts and IRAs.
Sign up for an account in a few minutes & start trading right away
To grab every opportunity, you can sign up for a new investment account at Webull and start trading within just one business day.
Free Access to Webull Desktop
Everyone is free to access Webull advanced and fully customizable platforms, on which you can view your watchlists, analyze charts, manage your orders and positions across all of Webull platforms, including mobile, PC, and web in order to stay connected with the markets.
Stay Connected Anytime Anywhere
Webull customer service team is available anytime for your inquiries, even during midnight.
Advanced Analysis Tools
With Webull charts, multiple technical indicators, tools and level 2 market data, you can analyse your portfolio in order to seize any trading opportunities.
How to open a Webull HK account?
Step 1
Download Webull Apps
First, download Webull apps in the App Store or Google Play Store. Then, sign up with either your phone number or email address.
Step 2
Enter your personal details + upload the required documents
Then, click ‘Open Account’ and fill in your personal details e.g. name, phone number, bank details, etc. as required and upload the required documents including proof of identity and proof of address.
Step 3
Deposit
Finally, you need to make an initial deposit of at least HK$10,000 to a designated Webull account. Once finished, you can get your account verified. You will receive a notification message on Webull apps/ through SMS/ email upon successful verification in 1-3 business days.
How to deposit in Webull accounts?
You can fund your Webull account using RMB or HKD using the methods listed below:
Bank Transfer
FPS
Wire Transfer
ATM/ Over-the-counter money transfer
Cheque
Are Webull HK brokerage accounts insured and protected?
Yes. As a member of SIPC, the securities of Webull Financial customers are protected up to HK$500,000 ($250,000 of cash). Webull HK has even purchased an additional insurance policy, providing further protection for securities and cash up to an aggregate of HK$150 million, capped at HK$37.5 million for any one customer’s securities and HK$900,000 for any one customer’s cash.
Webull VS Futu Brokerage Account
Commission
HK Stock：HK$0（via eletronic channels）or 0.25%，min. HK$100（via telephone ） HK Stock: HK$0 US Stock: US$0.0049/ share A-share: 0.03%

Welcome Offers
Receive a free stock, valued between $8 - $1600. Get 1 share of HSBC and Tencent each after depositing HK$20,000 or more
Webull HK Address
Address：Room 1806, 18/F, FWD Financial Centre, 308 Des Voeux Road. Central, Hong Kong
FAQ
Is Webull brokerage account considered as an offshore account?
No, it is not.
Is the Webull HK safe and legitimate?
Yes. As a member of SIPC, the securities of Webull Financial customers are protected up to HK$500,000 ($250,000 of cash).
How much is Webull HK's trading fees?
It is commission free.
